ygData.subject: RE: pet question
ygData.msgSnippet: to add to the confusion: my pc is a PII 450mhz, 128MB ram, EIDE hard drive, STB Riva TNT 16mb card. I have always had slow zoning compared to most people.
ygData.messageBody:
to add to the confusion:
my pc is a PII 450mhz, 128MB ram, EIDE hard drive, STB Riva TNT 16mb card.
I have always had slow zoning compared to most people. usually 5 secs or
more slower.
Until last week i had a 56k dial up.
Last week i got 1megabit ADSL.
I have seen NO (ZERO) zoning time improvement. I have no idea why. sometimes
(earlier with 56k) i would zone quickly, but very rarely.
I would LOVE to know the real cause. My thought is I/O rates of your
subsystem. SCSI would be faster tha EIDE, but i can't test that.

All I know now is that DSL is NOT making me zone fast despite that 60ms ping
i get to quake servers and 500kb/s download rates i get..
8(

-----Original Message-----
From: Beth [mailto:snowjaguar@...]
Sent: Thursday, February 24, 2000 1:03 PM
To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] pet question


From: Beth <snowjaguar@...>

Hey,

Question for the masses:

I'm level 14 and about 2 bubbs from 15. I'm in green pet hell. I had
heard the 12 level pet spell, well sucked. Do I get a reprieve at 16?
Can I look forward to yellow pets again?

This list is basically unmoderated. However abusive language will not be
tolerated
